item.title: How to Get a Tech Internship
item.description: A guide for landing your first internship as an undergraduate.

item.title: LLVM Intermediate Representation
item.description: A low-level, platform-independent code representation used by the LLVM compiler framework for compilation across multiple architectures.

item.title: Navigating Careers in Computer Science
item.description: A guide for career choices in computer science, including selecting the right company, balancing passion with prestige, and navigating diverse paths in tech.

item.title: Rust Ownership Model
item.description: The Rust Ownership Model ensures memory safety without a garbage collector by using rules around ownership, borrowing, and lifetimes.

item.title: The Linux Kernel - Process Scheduling
item.description: Exploring the process scheduling mechanism in the Linux kernel, which is responsible for determining how processes are allocated CPU time
